description: Episode number 1 of Series "Learning Series". The title was named by Robert, a bright nine year old, who lacks eye-hand coordination, has difficulty appreciating the characteristics of shapes and forms, has language difficulties of various kinds, who has poor gross motor coordination and other problems. While defining and describing these learning deficits indirectly shows somthing of the process of remediation.
